channel.title: Portfolios on Yuanzi Wang
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Yuanzi Wang

item.title: Educate-An online education platform
item.description: The COVID-19 has had a big impact on higher education. We designed an online education platform that help collage students transit to online education and keep a high study performance when they have to maintain social distance.

item.title: Automotive Huamn factors - A Mobile Office for Architects
item.description: Develop a mobile office in a ‘Level-3’ autonomous vehicle.

item.title: Automotive system engineering project - Design an autonomous truck
item.description: A digital twin autonomous truck system(DTADTS) was created.
